entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect nullable analysis of compound assignment due to double visit of operands #70646
    17.9
  • Wrong Line numbers are giving in case of / #70636

Closed

  • Collection literals not emitted correctly in Roslyn #70375
    17.9
  • Compiler crashes on unreachable code in exception filter with pattern matching in Release configuration only #70200
    17.9
  • Exception in `RefSafetyAnalysis` with nested collection initializer of `ref struct` type #70638
  • Missing CS0169 for ref fields without ref-assignments #69736
    17.9
  • Code Cleanup too aggressive with formatting of dotnet_diagnostic.CS0219 #70187
    17.9
  • '/warnaserror-:DiagnosticId' should not nullify diagnostic severity settings for 'DiagnosticId' in globalconfig #70570
    17.10
  • Assertion failure in semantic model on `foreach` with custom enumerator of pointer type #70340
    17.9
  • Make sure that CallerFilePath returns the correct filename, even in case of partial classes, split over different files #70619
    17.9
  • Label indentation wrong when immediately following if/for without brackets in dotnet format #70622
    Backlog
  • Likely incorrect `MemberNotNullWhen` application on `AttributeData.HasErrors` #70555
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Crash in AbstractChangeImplementationCodeRefactoringProvider #70647
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix fix all exception with duplicate Program declaration in top level program #70645
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix indentation of labels following selection/iteration statements without braces #70641
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Integration fixes #70635
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Address additional restore changes feedback #70633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Keep unsplit states when analyzing sequence points and sequences #70596
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Skip test, that fails on renamed project template tracked by issue #70627 #70630
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Additional clean up around handling of well known attributes #70632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: handle missing cases for ref struct collections in HasLocalScope #70642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove Tiered Compilation opt-out from AnalyzerRunner #70612
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #70131
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure bulk included diagnostic IDs for Code cleanup only fix Warning/Error diagnostics #70353
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure '/warnaserror-:DiagnosticId' does not nullify globalconfig severity setting #70572
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Perform decoding of AttributeUsageAttribute for PE types in PEModule. #70605
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9 P1
  • Adjust incorrect MemberNotNullWhen attribute #70557
    Area-Compilers, 17.9 P1
  • Merge `main` to `release/dev17.9` for 17.9P1 snap #70644
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix assert in semantic model of foreach over pointer #70640
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.9P1 #70637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve Hover markdown on 'await' keyword #70629
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid loading attributes for PE symbols for the purpose of getting AsyncMethodBuilderAttribute information. #70625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Prototype] Show project-wide first party 'Code analysis suggestions' in lightbulb menu #70621
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
